notes: objectProductionPlace[s] -- WILL BECOME PLACE AUTH REF FOR BOLINAS

This field is a mess.  In theory, it's for any creator, single or group, so objectProductionPerson, People, or Organization.  Luckily, when Bolinas used it for this, they seem to have focussed on People or Org. and left Person for the Artist field.  The other issue is that many/most of the object that use this field have a date in there.  Do we ask for cleanup, or map dates to objectProductionDate?
PP can have multiple values separated by comma, can we repeat the material group and insest each one in a new materialName? MC -- Yes.
